Career.title: Your project needs the best.
Career.description: From my experience with leading companies, I transform your ideas into innovative and high-performance web solutions. Trust my expertise to bring your digital ambitions to life.

Contact.title: Tell me about your project
Contact.description: Send me a message about your project and I will get back to you within 48 hours:
Contact.confirmation: I'll get back to you within 48 hours.
Contact.name: Name

IdeaToLaunchSteps.title: Idea to Launch
IdeaToLaunchSteps.description: I'll guide you through every step of the process, from your initial idea to a successful launch and beyond.

One.title: Tell me about your project
One.description: Free 30-minute consultation call to discuss your project idea.

Two.title: Proposal
Two.description: Costs and launch date - Receive a fixed-price offer and launch timeline within 5 working days.

Three.title: Start development
Three.description: Regular progress updates provided during the development process.

Four.title: Feedback & corrections
Four.description: Once development is complete, the project will be handed over for your feedback and adjustments.

Five.title: Launch
Five.description: When everything is to your liking, the project will be launched.

Six.title: Ongoing support
Six.description: Continued assistance with further development, bug fixes, and maintenance after launch.

Profile.intro: I'm a freelance web developer based in France. I improved my passion for coding in 2020 after a 15-year career in telecommunications and IT. Since then, I've immersed myself in the world of modern web development.
Profile.specialty: My specialty? Creating functional web experiences with React, Next.js, and Tailwind. I'm working with JavaScript and TypeScript, and I particularly enjoy working on full-stack projects.
Profile.learning: I run a Discord community where we share knowledge and explore best practices in the field together.
Profile.callToAction: Have an interesting web project? Let's talk about it!

One.title: Robust and secure web applications
One.description: Development of fast, scalable and secure web applications with a solid architecture.

Two.title: Web design
Two.description: High-speed website design with excellent SEO to showcase your content.

Three.title: React development
Three.description: User interface development, architecture, build systems and use of Next.js, with particular attention to accessibility (a11y).

Four.title: Node.js development
Four.description: Creation of high-performance web services and REST APIs, using best development practices and modern tools.

Joge.text: We were lucky to work on a project with Xavier. Very responsible, delivering high-quality and technical work, we were satisfied and recommend him for other projects.
Joge.author: Jorge Bravo Bertoglio

Pascal.text: Xavier has become a talented fullstack developer who has played an essential role in the creation of our club website. His exceptional contribution has transformed our vision into a stunning digital reality. What's more, he was able to create a website that not only met our needs, but far exceeded our expectations. His mastery of front-end and back-end development enabled him to design a fluid, user-friendly experience. His positive attitude and dedication make him a valuable asset to any development team. We've all been able to work with him, and he's been able to adapt to our different approaches, demands and personalities. Consequently, his ability to work as part of a team was also a valuable asset, collaborating effectively with other team members to achieve our common goals. Club306, its staff and members are delighted to recommend Xavier for your projects. We can't hide the fact that Xavier's work has been crucial in setting up our club's virtual strategy.
Pascal.author: Pascal BESNARD

Sandrine.text: We appreciated his professionalism and motivation. Xavier is a competent technical developer who made himself available when we needed him. It's with obvious confidence that we could entrust him with new missions. His charisma and human qualities are a plus in these working relationships.
Sandrine.author: Sandrine PELLISER
